content: this pattern is for a valentine s day gnome applique finished size about 4-3/4 free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-valentines-day-gnome/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format the pattern also includes instructions for the heart balloon and small heart video tutorial https //youtu be/rhmvnz0b3dq
